item.description: Join Barbara Moura as she introduces the Chakra’s of the body: Class 1 Focus:The Root Chakra, The Sacral Chakra and the Solar Plexus Chakra; Class 2 Focus: The Throat Chakra, The 3rd Eye Chakra and The Crown Chakra; Class 3 Focus: The Heart Chakra. All 3 evenings will be filled with fun and exploration as your energy levels become tranquil and balanced. Enjoy visualization and using tangible-colored props to feel one or more of the chakras and vibration(s) as well as a gently guided meditation to aide you in strengthening these vibrations. Before leaving each evening you will feel in tune, relaxed and at peace! Cost is $20 per class OR $50 for all 3 classes if prepaid in advance. Call the HSCC at  603-883-1490 to reserve your seat!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Exploring Your Chakras (Class 1 of 3)
